obfuscation: In short , if you 'd kindle The spark of a swindle , Lure simpletons into your clutches -- Yes ; into your clutches .
original:
In short, if you'd kindle
                 The spark of a swindle,
                      Lure simpletons into your clutches--
                           Yes; into your clutches.

obfuscation: Or hoodwink a debtor , You can not do better Than trot out a Duke or a Duchess -- A Duke or a Duchess !
original:
Or hoodwink a debtor,
                 You cannot do better

              Than trot out a Duke or a Duchess--

                 A Duke or a Duchess!

obfuscation: The Duke of Plaza-Toro , I believe ?
original: The Duke of Plaza-Toro, I believe?

obfuscation: Allow me to present -- The young lady one of us married ?
original:
Allow me to present--

 The young lady one of us married?

obfuscation: Gentlemen , I am the most obedient servant of one of you .
original:
Gentlemen, I am the most obedient servant of one of
  you.

obfuscation: I are now about to address myself to the gentleman whom my daughter married ; the other may allow his attention to wander if he likes , for what I am about to say does not concern him .
original:
I am now about to address myself to the gentleman
  whom my daughter married; the other may allow his attention to
  wander if he likes, for what I am about to say does not concern
  him.

obfuscation: Sir , you will find in this young lady a combination of excellences which you would search for in vain in any young lady who had not the full fortune to be my daughter .
original:
Sir, you will find in this young lady a combination of
  excellences which you would search for in vain in any young lady
  who had not the good fortune to be my daughter.

obfuscation: There is some little doubt as to which of you is the gentleman I am addressing , and which is the gentleman who is allowing his attention to wander ; but when that doubt is solved , I shall say , `` Take her , and may she make you happier than her mother has made me . ''
original:
There is some
  little doubt as to which of you is the gentleman I am addressing,
  and which is the gentleman who is allowing his attention to
  wander; but when that doubt is solved, I shall say , "Take her, and may she make
  you happier than her mother has made me."

obfuscation: And now there is a little matter to which I think I are entitled to take exception .
original:
And now there is a little matter to
  which I think I am entitled to take exception.

obfuscation: I come here in state with Her Grace the Duchess and Her Majesty my daughter , and what do I find ?
original:
I come here in
  state with Her Grace the Duchess and Her Majesty my daughter, and
  what do I find?

obfuscation: Do I find , for instance , a guard of honour to receive me ?
original:
Do I find, for instance, a guard of honour to
  receive me?

obfuscation: Yes -- one -- the Visitors ' , and I rang it myself .
original: Yes--one--the Visitors', and I rang it myself.

obfuscation: Upon my honour , I 'm very sorry ; but you see , I was brought up in a gondola , and my ideas of politeness are confined to taking off my cap to my passengers when they tip me .
original:
Upon my honour, I'm very sorry; but you see, I was
  brought up in a gondola, and my ideas of politeness are confined
  to taking off my cap to my passengers when they tip me.

obfuscation: That 's all very well in its way , but it is not enough .
original: That's all very well in its way, but it is not enough.
